manzils.text: qaaf. shapath hai aadaraneey quraan kee
balki unhen aashchary hua ki aa gaya unake paas ek saavadhaan karane vaala, unheen me se. to kaha kaafiron neh ye to bade aashchary[1] kee baat hai
kya jab ham mar jaayenge aur dhool ho jaayenge (to punah jeevit kiye jaayenge)? ye vaapasee to door kee baat[1] (asambhav) hai
hamen gyaan hai jo kam karatee hai dharatee unaka ansh tatha hamaare paas ek surakshit pustak[1] hai
balki unahonne jhuthala diya saty ko, jab aa gaya unake paas. isalie ulajhan mein pade hue hain
kya unhonne nahin dekha aakaash kee or apane oopar ki kaisa banaaya hai hamane use aur sajaaya hai usako aur nahin hai usamen koee daraad
tatha hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur daal diye usamen parvat tatha upajaayee usamen pratyek prakaar kee sundar vanaspatiyaan
aankh kholane tatha shiksha dene ke lie, pratyek allaah kee or dhyaanamagn bhakt ke lie
tatha hamane utaara aakaash se shubh jal, phir ugaaye usake dvaara baag tatha ann, jo kaate jaayen
tatha khajoor ke oonche vrksh, jinake guchchhe guthe hue hain
jeevika ke lie bhakton kee tatha hamane jeevit kar diya nirjeev nagar ko. isee prakaar (tumhen bhee) nikalana hai
jhuthalaaya isase pahale nooh kee jaati tatha kuven ke vaasiyon evan samood ne
tatha aad aur firaun evan loot ke bhaeeyon ne
tatha aika ke vaasiyon ne aur tubb[1] kee jaati ne. pratyek ne jhuthalaaya[2] rasoolon ko. antatah, sach ho gayee (unapar) hamaaree dhamakee
to kya ham thak gaye hain pratham baar paida karake? balki, ye log sandeh mein pade hue hain naye jeevan ke baare mein।
jabaki hamane hee paida kiya hai manushy ko aur ham jaanate hain jo vichaar aate hain usake man mein tatha ham adhik sameep hain usase (usakee) praananaadee[1] se
jabaki[1] (usake) daayen-baayen do farishte likh rahe hain
vah nahin bolata koee baat, magar use likhane ke lie usake paas ek nireekshak taiyaar hota hai
aa pahunchee maut kee achetana (be hoshee) saty lekar. ye vahee hai, jis se too bhaag raha tha
aur phoonk diya gaya soor (narasingha) mein. yahee yaatana ke vachan ka din hai
tatha aayega pratyek praanee is dasha mein ki usake saath ek haankane[1] vaala aur ek gavaah hoga
too isee se achet tha, to hamane door kar diya tera parda, to teree aankh aaj khoob dekh rahee hai
tatha kaha usake saathee[1] neh ye hai, jo mere paas taiyaar hai
donon (farishton ko aadesh hoga ki) phenk do narak mein pratyek kaafir (saty ke) virodhee ko
bhalaee ke rokane vaale, adharmee, sandeh karane vaale ko
jisane bana lie allaah ke saath doosare poojy, to donon ko phenk do, kadee yaatana mein
usake saathee (shaitaan) ne kahaah he hamaare paalanahaar! mainne ise kupath nahin kiya, parantu, vah svayan door ke kupath mein tha
allaah ne kahaah jhagada na karo mere paas. mainne to pahale hee (sansaar mein) tumhaaree or chetaavanee bhej dee thee
nahin badalee jaatee baat mere paas[1] aur na main tanik bhee atyaachaaree hoon bhakton ke lie
jis din ham kahenge narak se ki too bhar gayee? aur vah kahegee kya kuchh aur hai
tatha sameep kar dee jaayegee svarg, vah sadaachaariyon se kuchh door na hogee
ye hai jisaka tumhen vachan diya jaata tha, pratyek dhyaanamagn rakshak[1] ke lie
jo dara atyant krpaasheel se bin dekhe tatha lekar aaya dhyaanamagn dil
pravesh kar jao isamen, shaanti ke saath. ye sadaiv rahane ka din hai
unheen ke lie, jo ve ichchha karenge usamen milega tatha hamaare paas (isase bhee) adhik hai
tatha ham vinaash kar chuke hain inase poorv, bahut-se samudaayon ka, jo inase adhik the shakti mein. to ve phirate rahe nagaron mein, to kya kaheen koee bhaagane kee jagah pa sake
vaastav mein, isamen nishchay shiksha hai usake lie, jisake dil hon athava kaan dhare aur vah upasthit[1] ho
tatha nishchay hamane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh donon ke beech hai, chhah dinon mein aur hamen koee thakaan nahin huee
to aap sahan karen unakee baaton ko tatha pavitrata ka varnan karen apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath, soory ke nikalane se pahale tatha doobane se pahale
tatha raat ke kuchh bhaag mein usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen aur sajdon (namaazon) ke pashchaat (bhee)
tatha dhyaan se suno, jis din pukaarane vaala[1] pukaarega sameep sthaan se
jis din sab sunenge kadee aavaaz saty ke saath, vahee nikalane ka din hoga
vaastav mein, ham hee jeevan dete tatha maarate hain aur hamaaree or hee phirakar aana hai
jis din phat jaayegee dharatee unase, ve daudate hue (nikalenge), ye ekatr karana hamapar bahut saral hai
tatha ham bhalee-bhaanti jaanate hain use, jo kuchh ve kar rahe hain aur aap unhen balapoorvak manavaane ke lie nahin hain. to aap shiksha den quraan dvaara use, jo darata ho meree yaatana se
shapath hai (baadalon ko) bikherane vaaliyon kee
phir (baadalon ka) bojh laadane vaaliyon kee
phir dheemee gati se chalane vaaliyon kee
phir (allaah ka) aadesh baantane vaale (farishton kee)
nishchay jis (pralay) se tumhen daraaya ja raha hai, vah sachchee hai
tatha karmon ka phal avashy milane vaala hai
shapath hai raaston vaale aakaash kee
vaastav mein, tum vibhinn[1] baaton mein ho
usase vahee pher diya jaata hai, jo (saty se) phira hua ho
naash kar diye gaye anumaan lagaane vaale
jo apanee achetana mein bhoole hue hain
ve prashn[1] karate hain ki pratikaar ka din kab hai
(us din hai) jis din vah agni par tapaaye jaayenge
(unase kaha jaayegaah) svaad chakho apane upadrav ka. yahee vah hai, jisakee tum sheeghr maang kar rahe the
vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree svargon tatha jal sroton mein honge
lete hue jo kuchh pradaan kiya hai unahen, unake paalanahaaran ne. vastutah, ve isase pahale (sansaar mein) sadaachaaree the
ve raatri mein bahut kam soya karate the
tatha bhoron[1] mein kshama maangate the
aur unake dhanon mein maangane vaale[1] tatha na paane vaale ka haqa tha
tatha dharatee mein bahut-see nishaaniyaan hain vishvaas karane vaalon ke lie
tatha svayan tumhaare bheetar (bhee). phir kyon tum dekhate nahin
aur aakaash mein tumhaaree jeevika[1] hai tatha jisaka tumhen vachan diya ja raha hai
to shapath hai aakaash evan dharatee ke paalanahaar kee! ye (baat) aise hee sach hai, jaise tum bol rahe ho
(he nabee!) kya aayee aapake paas ibraaheem ke sammaanit atithiyon kee soochana
jab ve aaye usake paas, to salaam kiya. ibraaheem ne (bhee) salaam kiya (tatha kahaah) aparichit log hain
phir chupake se apane parijanon kee or gaya aur ek mota (bhuna hua) bachhada laaya
phir rakh diya unake paas, usane kahaah tum kyon nahin khaate ho
phir apane dil mein unase kuchh dara, unhonne kahaah daro nahin aur use shubh soochana dee ek gyaanee putr kee
to saamane aayee usakee patnee aur usane maar liya (aashchary se) apane munh par haath tatha kahaah main baanjh budhiya hoon
unhonne kahaah isee prakaar, tere paalanahaar ne kaha hai. vaastav mein, vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai
us (ibraaheem) ne kahaah to tumhaara kya abhiyaan hai, he bheje hue (farishto)
unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, ham bheje gaye hain ek apareedhee jaati kee or
taaki ham barasaayen unapar patthar kee kankaree
naamaankit[1] tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se ullanghanakaariyon ke lie
phir hamane nikaal diya jo bhee us (bastee) mein eemaan vaale the
aur hamane usamen mominon ka keval ek hee ghar[1] paaya
tatha chhod dee hamane us (bastee) mein ek nishaanee unake lie, jo darate hon duhkhadaayee yaatana se
tatha moosa (kee katha) mein, jab hamane bheja use firaun kee or pratyaksh (khule) pramaan ke saath
to vah vimukh ho gaya apane bal-boote ke kaaran aur kah diya ki jaadoogar athava paagal hai
antatah, hamane pakad liya usako tatha usakee senaon ko, phir phenk diya unhen saagar mein aur vah nindit hokar rah gaya
tatha aad mein (shikshaaprad nishaanee hai). jab hamane bhej dee unapar baanjh[1] aandhee
vah nahin chhodatee thee kisee vastu ko jisapar guzaratee, parantu use bana detee thee jeern choor-choor haddee ke samaan
tatha samood mein jab unase kaha gaya ki laabhaanvit ho lo, ek nishchit samay tak
to unhonne avagya kee apane paalanahaar ke aadesh kee, to sahasa pakad liya unhen kadak ne aur ve dekhate rah gaye
to ve na khade ho sake aur na (hamase) badala le sake
tatha nooh[1] kee jaati ko isase pahale (yaad karo). vaastav mein, ve avagyaakaaree jaati the
tatha aakaash ko hamane banaaya hai haathon[1] se aur ham nishchay vistaar karane vaale hain
tatha dharatee ko hamane bichhaaya hai, to ham kya[1] hee achchhe bichhaane vaale hain
tatha pratyek vastu ko hamane utpann kiya hai joda, taaki tum shiksha grahan karo
to tum daudo allaah kee or, vaastav mein, main tumhen usakee or se pratyaksh roop se (khula) saavadhaan kar ne vaala hoon
aur mat banao allaah ke saath koee doosara poojy. vaastav mein, main tumhen isase khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon
isee prakaar nahin aaya unake paas jo in (makka vaasiyon) se poorv rahe koee rasool, parantu unhonne kaha ki jaadoogar ya paagal hai
kya ve ek-doosare ko vasiyyat[1] kar chuke hain isakee? balki ve ullanghanakaaree log hain
to aap mukh pher len unase. aapakee koee ninda nahin hai
aur aap shiksha dete rahen. isalie ki shiksha laabhaprad hai imaan vaalon ke lie
aur nahin utpann kiya hai mainne jinn tatha manushy ko, parantu taaki meree hee ibaadat karen
main nahin chaahata hoon unase koee jeevika aur na chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaayen
avashy allaah hee jeevika daata, shaktishaalee, balavaan hai
to in atyaachaariyon ke paap hain inake saathiyon ke paapon ke samaan, atah utaavale na banen
antatah, vinaash hai kaafiron ke lie unake us din[1] se, jisase he daraaye ja rahe hain
shapath hai toor[1] (parvat) kee
aur likhee huee pustak[1] kee
jo jhillee ke khule pannon mein likhee huee hai
tatha baitul maamoor (aabaad[1] ghar) kee
tatha oonchee chhat (aakaash) kee
aur bhadakaaye hue saagar[1] kee
vastutah, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana hokar rahegee
nahin hai use koee rokane vaala
jis din aakaash dagamagaayega
tatha parvat chalenge
to vinaash hai us din, jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie
jo vivaad mein khel rahe hain
jis din ve dhakka diye jaayenge narak kee agni kee or
(unase kaha jaayegaah) yahee vah narak hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the
to kya ye jaadoo hai ya tumhen sujhaee nahin deta
isamen pravesh kar jao, phir sahan karo ya sahan na karo, tumapar samaan hai. tum usee ka badala diye ja rahe ho, jo tum kar rahe the
nishchay, aagyaakaaree baagon tatha sukhon mein honge. prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hoga unhen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unhen, unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se
prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hai unahen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unahen unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se
(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao aur piyo manamaanee, usake badale mein, jo tum kar rahe the
takiye lagaaye hue honge takhton par baraabar bichhe hue tatha ham vivaah denge unako badee aankhon vaalee striyon se

aur jo log eemaan laaye aur anusaran kiya unaka, unakee santaan ne eemaan ke saath, to hm mila denge unakee santaan ko unake saath tatha nahin kam karenge unake karmon mein se kuchh, pratyek vyakti apane karmon ka bandhak[1] hai
tatha adhik denge unhen meve tatha maans jisakee ve roochi rakhenge
ve ek-doosare se usamen lete rahenge madira ke pyaale, jisamen na koee vyarth baat hogee, na koee paap kee baat
aur phirate rahenge unakee seva mein (sundar) baalak, jaise vah chhupaaye hue motee hon
aur ve (svarg vaasee) sammukh honge ek-doosare ke prashn karate hue
ve kahengeh isase poorv[1] ham apane parijanon mein darate the
to allaah ne upakaar kiya hamapar tatha hamen surakshit kar diya taapalaharee kee yaatana se
isase poorv[1] ham vandana kiya karate the usakee. nishchay vah ati paropakaaree, dayaavaan hai
to aap shiksha dete rahen. kyonki aapake paalanahaar kee anugrah se na aap kaahin (jyotishi) hain aur na paagal
kya ve kahate hain ki ye kavi hain, ham prateeksha kar rahe hain usake saath kaalachakr kee
aap kah den ki tum prateeksha karate raho, main (bhee) tumhaare saath prateeksha karata hoon
kya unhen sikhaatee hain unakee samajh ye baaten athava vah ullanghanakaaree log hain
kya ve kahate hain ki is (nabee) ne is (quraan) ko svayan bana liya hai? vaastav mein, ve eemaan laana nahin chaahate
to ve le aayen is (quraan) ke samaan koee ek baat, yadi ve sachche hain
kya ve paida ho gaye hain bina[1] kisee ke paida kiye athava ve svayan paida karane vaale hain
ya unhonne hee utpatti kee hai aakaashon tatha dharatee kee? vaastav mein, ve vishvaas hee nahin rakhate
athava unake paas aapake paalanahaar ke koshaagaar hain ya vahee (usake) adhikaaree hain
athava unake paas koee seedhee hai, jise lagaakar sunate[1] hain? to unaka sunane vaala koee khula pramaan prastut kare
kya allaah ke lie putriyaan hon tumhaare lie putr hon
ya aap maang kar rahe hain unase kisee paarishramik[1] kee, to ve usake bojh se dabe ja rahe hain
athava unake paas paroksh (ka gyaan) hai, jise ve likh[1] rahe hain
ya ve chaahate hain koee chaal chalana? to jo kaafir ho gaye, ve us chaal mein grast honge
athava unaka koee or upaasy (poojy) hai allaah ke siva? allaah pavitr hai unake shirk se
yadi ve dekh len koee khand aakaash se girata hua, to kahenge ki tah par tah baadal hai
atah, aap chhod den unhen, yahaan tak ki ve mil jaayen apane us din se, jisamen[1] inhen apanee sudhd nahin hogee
us din nahin kaam aayegee unake, unakee chaal kuchh aur na unakee sahaayata kee jaayegee
tatha nishchay atyaachaariyon ke lie ek yaatana hai isake atirikt[1] (bhee). parantu, unamen se adhiktar gyaan nahin rakhate hain

aur (he nabee!) aap sahan karen apane paalanahaar ka aadesh aane tak. vaastav mein, aap hamaaree raksha mein hain tatha pavitrata ka varnan karen apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath jab jaagate hon
tatha raatree mein (bhee) usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen aur taaron ke doobane ke[1] pashchaat (bhee)
shapath hai taare kee, jab vah doobane lage
nahin kupath hua hai tumhaara saathee aur na kumaarg hua hai
aur vah nahin bolate apanee ichchha se
vah to bas vahyee (prakaashana) hai. jo (unakee or) kee jaatee hai
sikhaaya hai jise unhen shaktivaan ne
bade balashaalee ne, phir vah seedha khada ho gaya
tatha vah aakaash ke ooparee kinaare par tha
phir sameep hua aur phir latak gaya
phir ho gaya do kamaan ke baraabar athava usase bhee sameep
phir usane vahyee kee us (allaah) ke bhakt[1] kee or, jo bhee vahyee kee
nahin jhuthalaaya unake dil ne, jo kuchh unhonne dekha
to kya tum unase jhagadate ho usapar, jise ve (aankhon se) dekhate hain
nihsandeh, unhonne use ek baar aur bhee utarate dekha
sid-ratul munha[1] ke paas
jisake paas jannatul[1] maava hai
jab sid-rah par chha raha tha, jo kuchh chha raha tha
na to nigaah chundhiyaee aur na seema se aage huee
nishchay aapane apane paalanahaar kee badee nishaaniyaan dekheen
to (he mushriko!) kya tumane dekh liya laatt tatha uzza ko
tatha ek teesare manaat ko
kya tumhaare lie putr hain aur us allaah ke lie putriyaan
ye to bada bhonda vibhaajan hai

vaastav mein, ye kuchh keval naam hain, jo tumane tatha tumhaare poorvajon ne rakh liye hain. nahin utaara hai allaah ne unaka koee pramaan. ve keval anumaan[1] par chal rahe hain tatha apanee manamaanee par. jabaki aa chuka hai unake paalanahaar kee or se maargadarshan
kya manushy ko vahee mil jaayega, jisakee vah kaamana kare
(nahin, ye baat nahin hai) kyonki allaah ke adhikaar mein hai aakhirat (paralok) tatha sansaar
aur aakaashon mein bahut-se farishte hain, jinakee anushansa kuchh laabh nahin detee, parantu isake pashchaat ki anumati de allaah jisake lie chaahe tatha usase prasann ho
vaastav mein, jo eemaan nahin laate paralok par, ve naam dete hain farishton ke, striyon ke naam
unhen isaka koee gyaan nahin. ve anusaran kar rahe hain maatr gumaan ka aur vastutah gumaan nahin laabhaprad hota saty ke saamane kuchh bhee
atah, aap vimukh ho jaayen usase, jisane munh pher liya hai hamaaree shiksha se tatha vah saansaarik jeevan hee chaahata hai
yahee unake gyaan kee pahunch hai. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee adhik jaanata hai use, jo kupath ho gaya usake maarg se tatha use, jisane sammaarg apana liya
tatha allaah hee ka hai jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai, taaki vah badala de use, jisane buraee kee usake kukarm ka aur badala de use, jisane sukarm kiya achchha badala

un logon ko jo bachate hain maha paapon tatha nirlajja[1] se, kuchh chook ke siva. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar udaar, kshamaasheel hai. vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai tumhen, jabaki usane paida kiya tumhen dharatee[2] se tatha jab tum bhrun the apanee maataon ke garbh mein. atah, apane mein pavitr na bano. vahee bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai use, jisane sadaachaar kiya hai
to kya aapane use dekha jisane munh pher liya
aur tanik daan kiya phir ruk gaya
kya usake paas paroksh ka gyaan hai ki vah (sab kuchh) dekh[1] raha hai
kya use soochana nahin huee un baaton kee, jo moosa ke granthon mein hain
aur ibraaheem kee, jisane (apana vachan) poora kar diya
ki koee doosare ka bhaar nahin laadega
aur ye ki manushy ke lie vahee hai, jo usane prayaas kiya
aur ye ki usaka prayaas sheeghr dekha jaayega
phir pratiphal diya jaayega use poora pratiphal
aur ye ki aapake paalanahaar kee or hee (sabako) pahunchana hai
tatha vahee hai, jisane (sansaar mein) hansaaya tatha rulaaya
tatha useene maara aur jivaaya
tatha useene donon prakaar utpann kiye; nar aur naaree
veery se, jab (garbhaashay mein) gira
tatha usee ke oopar doosaree baar[1] utpann karana hai
tatha useene dhanee banaaya aur dhan diya
aur vahee sheara[1] ka svaamee hai
tatha useene dhvast kiya pratham[1] aad ko
tatha samood[1] ko. kisee ko shesh nahin rakha
tatha nooh kee jaati ko isase pahale, vastutah, ve bade atyaachaaree, avagyaakaaree the
tatha aundhee kee huee bastee[1] ko usane gira diya
phir usapar chha diya, jo chha[1] diya
to (he manushy!) too apane paalanahaar ke kin kin puraskaaron mein sandeh karata rahega
ye[1] sachetakarta hai, pratham sachetakartaon mein se
sameep aa lagee sameep aane vaalee
nahin hai allaah ke siva use koee door karane vaala
to kya tum is[1] quraan par aashchary karate ho
tatha hansate ho aur rote nahin
tatha vimukh ho rahe ho
atah, sajda karo allaah ke lie tatha usee kee vandana[1] karo
sameep aa gayee[1] pralay tatha do khand ho gaya chaand
aur yadi ve dekhate hain koee nishaanee, to munh pher lete hain aur kahate hain: ye to jaadoo hai, jo hota raha hai
aur unhonne jhuthalaaya aur anusaran kiya apanee aakaankshaon ka aur pratyek kaary ka ek nishchit samay hai
aur nishchay aa chuke hain unake paas kuchh aise samaachaar, jinamen chetaavanee hai
ye (quraan) poornatah tatvadarshita (gyaan) hai, phir bhee nahin kaam aayee unake, chetaavaniyaan
to aap vimukh ho jaayen unase, jis din pukaarane vaala pukaarega ek apriy cheez kee[1] or
jhukee hongee unakee aankhen. ve nikal rahe honge samaadhiyon se, jaise ki ve tiddee dal hon bikhare hue
to usane praarthana kee apane paalanahaar se ki main vivash hoon, atah, mera badala le le
jhuthalaaya inase pahale nooh kee jaati ne. to jhuthalaaya unhonne hamaare bhakt ko aur kaha ki paagal hai aur (use) jhadaka gaya
to usane praarthana kee apane paalanahaar se ki main vivash hoon, atah mera badala le le
to hamane khol diye aakaash ke dvaar dhaara pravaah jal ke saath
tatha phaad diye dharatee ke srot, to mil gaya (aakaash aur dharatee ka) jal us kaary ke anusaar jo nishchit kiya gaya
aur savaar kar diya hamane use (nooh ko) takhton tatha keelon vaalee (naav) par
jo chal rahee thee hamaaree raksha mein, usaka badala lene ke lie, jisake saath kufr kiya gaya tha
aur hamane chhod diya ise ek shiksha banaakar. to kya, hai koee shiksha grahan karane vaala

he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! allaah se daro aur eemaan lao usake rasool par, vah tumhen pradaan karega dohaara[1] pratiphal apanee daya se tatha pradaan karega tumhen aisa prakaash, jisake saath tum chaloge tatha kshama kar dega tumhen aur allaah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai

taaki gyaan ho jaaye in baaton se ahle[1] kitaab ko ki vah kuchh shakti nahin rakhate allaah ke anugrah par aur ye ki anugrah allaah hee ke haath mein hai. vah pradaan karata hai, jise chaahe aur allaah bade anugrah vaala hai

(he nabee!) allaah ne sun lee hai us stree kee baat, jo aapase jhagad rahee thee apane pati ke vishay mein tatha guhaar rahee thee allaah ko aur allaah sun raha tha tum donon ka vaartaalaap, vaastav mein, vah sab kuchh sunane-dekhane vaala hai

jo zihaar[1] karate hain tumamen se apanee patniyon se, to ve unakee maan nahin hain. unakee maan to ve hain, jinhonne unahen janm diya hai aur vah bolate hain apriy tatha jhoothee baat aur vaastav mein allaah maaf karane vaala, kshamaasheel hai

aur jo zihaar kar lete hain apanee patniyon se, phir vaapas lena chaahate hain apanee baat, to (usaka dand) ek daas mukt karana hai, isase poorv ki ek-doosare ko haath lagaayen.[1] iseekee tumhen shiksha dee ja rahee hai aur allaah usase jo tum karate ho, bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai

phir jo (daas) na paaye, to do maheene nirantar roza (vrat) rakhana hai, isase poorv kee ek-doosare ko haath lagaaye. phir jo sakat na rakhe, to saath nirdhanon ko bhojan karaana hai. ye aadesh isalie hai, taaki tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool par aur ye allaah kee seemaayen hain tatha kaafiron ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai

vaastav mein, jo virodh karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool ka, ve apamaanit kar diye jaayenge, jaise apamaanit kar diye gaye, jo inase poorv hue aur hamane utaar dee hain khulee aayaten aur kaafiron ke lie apamaanakaaree yaatana hai
jis din jeevit karega un sab ko allaah, to unhen soochit kar dega unake karmon se. gin rakha hai use allaah ne aur vah bhool gaye hain use aur allah pratyek vastu par gavaah hai

kya aapane nahin dekha ki allaah jaanata hai, jo (bhee) aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai? nahin hotee kisee teen kee kaana-phoosee, parantu vah unaka chautha hota hai aur na paanch kee, parantu vah unaka chhatha hota hai aur na isase kam kee aur na isase adhik kee, parantu vah unake saath hota[1] hai, ve jahaan bhee hon. phir vah unhen soochit kar dega unake karmon se pralay ke din. vaastav mein, allaah pratyek vastu se bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai

kya aapane nahin dekha unhen, jo roke gaye hain kaana-phoosee[1] se? phir (bhee) vahee karate hain jisase roke gaye hain tatha kaana-phoosee karate hain paap aur atyaachaar tatha rasool kee avagya kee aur ve jab aapake paas aate hain, to aapako aise (shabd se) salaam karate hain, jisase aapapar salaam nahin bheja allaah ne tatha kahate hain apane manon mein: kyon allaah hamen yaatana nahin deta usapar jo ham kahate[1] hain? paryaapt hai unhen narak, jisamen ve pravesh karenge, to bura hai unaka thikaana

he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! jab tum kaana-phoosee karo, to kaana-phoosee na karo paap tatha atyaachaar evan rasool kee avagya kee aur kaana phoosee karo puny tatha sadaachaar kee aur darate raho allaah se, jisakee or hee tum ekatr kiye jooge

vaastav mein, kaana-phoosee shaitaanee kaam hain, taaki vo udaaseen hon,[1] jo eemaan laaye. jabaki nahin hai vah haanikar unhen kuchh, parantu allaah kee anumati se aur allaah hee par chaahiye ki bharosa karen eemaan vaale

he eemaan vaalo! jab tumase kaha jaaye ki vistaar kar do apanee sabhaon mein, to vistaar[1] kar do, vistaar kar dega allaah tumhaare lie tatha jab kaha jaaye ki sukad jao, to sukad jao. ooncha[2] kar dega allaah unhen, jo eemaan laaye hain tumamen se tatha jinhen gyaan pradaan kiya gaya hai, kaee shreniyaan tatha allaah usase jo tum karate ho, bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai

he eemaan vaalo! jab tum akele baat karo rasool se, to baat karane se pahale kuchh daan karo.[1] ye tumhaare lie uttam tatha adhik pavitr hai. phir yadi tum (daan ke lie kuchh) na pao, to allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai

kya tum (is aadesh se) dar gaye ki ekaant mein baat karane se pahale kuchh daan kar do? phir jab tumane aisa nahin kiya, to sthaapana karo namaaz kee tatha zakaat do aur aagya paalan karo allaah tatha usake rasool kee aur allaah soochit hai usase, jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho
kya aapane unhen dekha[1] jinhonne mitr bana liya us samudaay ko, jisapar krodhit ho gaya allaah? na ve tumhaare hain aur na unake aur ve shapath lete hain jhoothee baat par, jaan-boojh kar
taiyaar kee hai allaah ne unake lie kadee yaatana, vaastav mein, vah bura hai, jo ve kar rahe hain
unhonne bana liya apanee shapathon ko ek dhaal. phir rok diya (logon ko) allaah kee roh se, to unheen ke lie apamaanakaaree yaatana hai
kadaapi nahin kaam aayenge unake dhan aur na unakee santaan allaah ke samaksh kuchh. vahee naarakee hain, ve usamen sadaavaasee honge

jis din khada karega unhen allaah, to ve shapath lenge allaah ke samaksh, jaise ve shapath le rahe hain tumhaare samaksh aur ve samajh rahe hain ki ve kuchh (tark)[1] par hain. sun lo! vaastav mein vahee jhoothe hain
chha[1] gaya hai unapar shaitaan aur bhula dee hai unhen allaah kee yaad. yahee shaitaan kee sena hai. sun lo! shaitaan kee sena hee kshatigrast hone vaalee hai
vaastav mein, jo virodh karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool ka, vahee apamaaniton mein se hain
likh rakha hai allaah ne ki avashy main prabhaavashaalee (vijayee) rahoonga[1] tatha mere rasool. vaastav mein, allaah ati shaktishaalee, prabhaavashaalee hai

aap nahin paayenge unhen, jo eemaan rakhate hon allaah tatha ant-divas (pralay) par ki ve maitree karate hon unase, jinhonne virodh kiya allaah aur usake rasool ka, chaahe ve unake pita hon, unake putr, unake bhaee athava unake parijan[1] hon. vahee hain, likh diya hai (allaah ne) jinake dilon mein eemaan aur samarthan diya hai jinhen apanee or se rooh (aatma) dvaara tatha pravesh dega unhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge jinamen. prasann ho gaya allaah unase tatha ve prasann ho gaye usase. vah allaah ka samooh hai. sun lo, allaah ka samooh hee saphal hone vaala hai
allaah kee pavitrata ka gaan kiya hai usane, jo bhee aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur vah prabhutvashaalee, gunee hai

vahee hai, jisane ahle kitaab mein se kaafiron ko unake gharon se pahale hee aakraman mein nikaal diya. tumane nahin samajha tha ki ve nikal jaayenge aur unhonne samajha tha ki rakshak honge unake durg[1] allaah se. to aa gaya unake paas allaah (ka nirnay). aisa unhonne socha bhee na tha tatha daal diya unake dilon mein bhay. ve ujaad rahe the apane gharon ko apane haathon se tatha eemaan vaalon ke haathon[2] se. to shiksha lo, he aankh vaalo
aur yadi allaah ne na likh diya hota un (ke bhaagy mein) desh nikaala, to unhen yaatana de deta sansaar (hee) mein tatha unake lie akhirat (paralok) mein narak kee yaatana hai
ye isalie ki unhonne virodh kiya allaah tatha usake rasool ka aur jo virodh karega allaah ka, to nishchay allaah kadee yaatana dene vaala hai
(he musalamaano!) tumane nahin kaata[1] koee khajoor ka vrksh aur na chhoda use khada apane tane par, parantu ye sab allaah ke aadesh se hua aur taaki vah apamaanit kare pathabhrashton ko

aur jo dhan dila diya allaah ne apane rasool ko unase, to nahin daudaaye tumane usake lie ghode aur na oont. parantu allaah prabhutv pradaan kar deta hai apane rasool ko, jisapar chaahata hai tatha allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai

allaah ne jo dhan dilaaya hai apane rasool ko is bastee vaalon[1] se, vah allaah, rasool, (aapake) sameepavartiyon, anaathon, nirdhanon tatha yaatriyon ke lie hai; taaki vah (dhan) phirata na rah[2] jaaye tumhaare dhanavaanon ke beech aur jo pradaan kar de rasool, tum use le lo aur rok den tumhen jisase, tum usase ruk jao tatha allaah se darate raho, nishchay allaah kadee yaatana dene vaala hai

un nirdhan muhaajiron ke lie hai, jo nikaal diye gaye apane gharon tatha dhanon se. ve chaahate hain allaah ka anugrah tatha prasannata aur sahaayata karate hain allaah tatha usake rasool kee, yahee sachche hain

tatha un logon[1] ke lie (bhee), jinhonne aavaas bana liya is ghar (madeena) ko tatha un (muhaajiron ke aane) se pahale eemaan laaye, ve prem karate hain unase, jo hijarat karake aa gaye unake yahaan aur ve nahin paate apane dilon mein koee aavashyakta usakee, jo unhen diya jaaye aur praathamikta dete hain doosaron ko apane oopar, chaahe svayan bhookhe[1] hon aur jo bacha liye gaye apane man kee tangee se, to vahee saphal hone vaale hain

aur jo aaye unake pashchaat, ve kahate hain: he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen kshama kar de tatha hamaare un bhaeeyon ko, jo hamase pahale eemaan laaye aur na rakh hamaare dilon mein koee bair unake lie, jo eemaan laaye. he hamaare paalanahaar! too ati karunaamay, dayaavaan hai

kya aapane unhen[1] nahin dekha, jo munaafiq (avasaravaadee) ho gaye aur kahate hain apane ahle kitaab bhaeeyon se ki yadi tumhen desh nikaala diya gaya, to ham avashy nikal jaayenge tumhaare saath aur nahin maanenge tumhaare baare mein kisee kee (baat) kabhee aur yadi tumase yudhd hua to ham avashy tumhaaree sahaayata karenge tatha allaah gavaah hai ki ve jhoothe hain

yadi ve nikaale gaye to ye unake saath nahin nikalenge aur yadi unase yudhd ho, to ve unakee sahaayata nahin karenge aur yadi unakee sahaayata kee (bhee,) to avashy peeth dikha denge, phir kaheen se koee sahaayata nahin paayenge
nishchay adhik bhay hai tumhaara unake dilon mein allaah (ke bhay) se. ye isalie ki ve samajh-boojh nahin rakhate

ve nahin yudhd karenge tumase ekatr hokar, parantu ye ki durg band bastiyon mein hon athava kisee deevaar kee aad se. unaka yudhd aapas mein bahut kada hai. aap unhen ekatr samajhate hain, jabaki unake dil alag alag hain. ye isalie ki ve nirbodh hote hain
unake samaan, jo unase kuchh hee poorv chakh chuke[1] hain apane kiye ka svaad aur inake lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai

(unaka udaaharan) shaitaan jaisa hai ki vah kahata hai manushy se ki kufr kar, phir jab vah kaafir ho gaya, to kah diya ki main tujhase virakt (alag) hoon. main to darata hoon allaah, sarvalok ke paalanahaar se
to ho gaya un donon ka dushparinaam ye ki ve donon narak mein sadaavaasee rahenge aur yahee hai atyaachaariyon ka kuphal
he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! allaah se daro aur dekhana chaahiye pratyek ko ki usane kya bheja hai kal ke lie tatha darate raho allaah se, nishchay allaah soochit hai usase, jo tum karate ho
aur na ho jao unake samaan, jo bhool gaye allaah ko, to bhula diya (allaah ne) unhen apane aapase, yahee avagyaakaaree hain
nahin baraabar ho sakate naarakee tatha svargee. svaargee hee vaastav mein saphal hone vaale hain

yadi ham avatarit karate is quraan ko kisee parvat par, to aap use dekhate ki jhuka ja raha hai tatha kan-kan hota ja raha hai, allaah ke bhay se aur in udaaharanon ka varnan ham logon ke lie kar rahe hain, taaki ve soch-vichaar karen. vah khule tatha chhupe ka jaanane vaala hai. vahee atyant krpaasheel, dayaavaan hai
vah allaah hee hai, jisake atirikt koee (saty) poojy nahin hai

vah allaah hee hai, jisake atirikt nahin hai[1] koee sachcha vandaneey. vah sabaka svaamee, atyant pavitr, sarvatha shaanti pradaan karane vaala, rakshak, prabhaavashaalee, shaktishaalee bal poorvak aadesh laagoo karane vaala, badaee vaala hai. pavitr hai allaah usase, jise ve (usaka) saajhee banaate hain

vahee allaah hai, paida karane vaala, banaane vaala, roop dene vaala. usee ke lie shubh naam hain, usakee pavitrata ka varnan karata hai jo (bhee) aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur vah prabhaavashaalee, haikmat vaala hai

he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! mere shatruon tatha apane shatruon ko mitr ne banao. tum sandesh bhejate ho unakee or maitree[1] ka, jabaki unhonne kufr kiya hai usaka, jo tumhaare paas saty aaya hai. ve desh nikaala dete hain rasool ko tatha tumako is kaaran ki tum eemaan laaye ho allaah, apane paalanahaar par? yadi tum nikale ho jihaad ke lie meree raah mein aur meree prasannata kee khoj ke lie, to gupt roop se unhen maitree ka sandesh bhejate ho? jabaki main bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hoon use, jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo khulakar karate ho? tatha jo karega aisa, to nishchay vah kupath ho gaya seedhee raah se
aur yadi vash mein pa jaayen tumhen, to tumhaare shatru ban jaayen tatha tumhen apane haathon aur zubaanon se duhkh pahunchaayen aur chaahane lagenge ki tum (phir) kaafir ho jao
tumhen laabh nahin denge tumhaare sambandhee aur na tumhaaree santaan pralay ke din. vah (allaah) alagaav kar dega tumhaare beech aur allaah jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho, use dekh raha hai

tumhaare lie ibraaheem tatha usake saathiyon mein ek achchha aadarsh hai. jabaki unhonne apanee jaati se kahaah nishchay ham virakt hain tumase tatha unase, jinakee tum ibaadat (vandana) karate ho allaah ke atirikt. hamane tumase kufr kiya. khul chuka hai bair hamaare tatha tumhaare beech aur krodh sada ke lie. jab tak tum eemaan na lao akele allaah par, parantu ibraaheem ka (ye) kathan apane pita se ki main avashy tere lie kshama kee praarthana[1] karoonga aur main nahin adhikaar rakhata hoon allaah ke samaksh kuchh. he hamaare paalanahaar! hamane tere hee oopar bharosa kiya aur teree hee or dhyaan kiya hai aur teree hee or phir aana hai
he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen na bana pareeksha[1] (ka saadhan) kaafiron ke lie aur hamen kshama kar de, he hamaare paalanahaar! vaastav mein, too hee prabhutvashaalee, gunee hai
nihsandeh, tumhaare lie unamen ek achchha aadarsh hai, usake lie, jo aasha rakhata ho allaah tatha antim divas (pralay) kee aur jo vimukh ho, to nishchay allaah nisprh prashansit hai
kuchh door nahin ki allaah bana de tumhaare beech tatha unake beech, jinase tum bair rakhate ho prem[1] aur allaah bada saamarthyavaan hai aur allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai

allaah tumhen nahin rokata unase, jinhonne tumase yudhd na kiya ho dharm ke vishay mein aur na bahishkaar kiya ho tumhaara, tamhaare desh se, isase ki tum unase achchha vyavahaar karo aur nyaay karo unase. vaastav mein allaah prem karata hai nyaayakaariyon[1] se

tumhen allaah bas unase rokata hai, jinhonne yudhd kiya ho tumase dharm ke vishay mein tatha bahishkaar kiya ho tumhaara tumhaare gharon se aur sahaayata kee ho, tumhaara bahishkaar karaane mein ki tum maitree rakho unase aur jo maitree karenge unase, to vahee atyaachaaree hain

he eemaan vaalo! jab tumhaare paas musalamaan striyaan hijarat karake aayen, to unakee pareeksha le liya karo. allaah adhik jaanata hai unake eemaan ko, phir yadi tumhen ye gyaan ho jaaye ki ve eemaan vaaliyaan hain, to unhen vaapas na karo[1] kaafiron kee or. na ve auraten halaal (vaidh) hain unake lie aur na ve (kaafir) halaal (vaidh) hain un auraton ke lie.[2] aur chuka do un (kaafiron) ko, jo unhonne kharch kiya ho tatha tumapar koee dosh nahin hai ki vivaah kar lo unase, jab de do unhen unaka mahar (stree upahaar) tatha na rakho kaafir striyon ko apane vivaah mein tatha maang lo jo tumane kharch kiya ho aur chaahiye ki ve (kaafir) maang len, jo unhonne kharch kiya ho. ye allaah ka aadesh hai, vah nirnay kar raha hai tumhaare beech tatha allaah sab jaanane vaala, gunee hai

aur yadi tumhaare haath se nikal jaaye tumhaaree koee patnee kaafiron kee or aur tumhen badale[1] ka avasar mil jaaye, to chuka do unhen, jinakee patniyaan chalee gaee hain, usake baraabar, jo unhonne kharch kiya hai tatha darate raho us allaah se jis par tum eemaan rakhate ho

he nabee! jab aayen aapake paas eemaan vaaliyaan, taaki[1] vachan den aapako is baat par ki ve saajhee nahin banaayengee allaah ka kisee ko, na choree karengee, na vyabhichaar karengee, na vadh karengee apanee santaan ko, na koee aisa aarop (kalank) lagaayengee jise unhonne ghad liya ho apane haathon tatha pairon ke aage aur na avagya karengee aapakee kisee bhale kaam mein, to aap vachan le liya karen unase tatha kshama kee praarthana karen unake lie allaah se. vaastav mein allaah ati kshamaasheel tatha dayaavaan hai

he eemaan vaalo! tum un logon ko mitr na banao, krodhit ho gaya hai allaah, jinapar. ve niraash ho chuke hain aakhirat[1] (paralok) se, usee prakaar, jaise kaafir samaadhiyon mein pade hue logon (ke jeevit hone) se niraash hain
allaah kee pavitrata ka gaan karatee hai, jo vastu aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur vah prabhutvashaalee, gunee hai
he eemaan vaalo! tum vah baat kyon kahate ho jo karate nahin
atyant apriy hai allaah ko tumhaaree vah baat kahana, jise tum (svayan) karate nahin
nihsandeh allaah prem karata hai unase, jo yudhd karate hain usakee raah mein panktiband hokar, jaise ki vah seesa pilaee deevaar hon

tatha yaad karo jab kaha moosa ne apanee jaati seh he mere samudaay! tum kyon duhkh dete ho mujhe jabaki tum jaanate ho ki main allaah ka rasool hoon tumhaaree or? phir jab vah tedhe hee rah gaye, to tedhe kar diye allaah ne unake dil aur allaah sammaarg nahin dikhaata ullanghanakaariyon ko

tatha yaad karo jab kaha maryam ke putr eesa neh he israeel kee santaan! main tumhaaree or rasool hoon aur pushti karane vaala hoon us tauraat kee jo mujhase poorv aayee hai tatha shubh soochana dene vaala hoon ek rasool kee, jo aayega mere pashchaat, jisaka naam ahmad hai. phir jab vah aa gaye unake paas khule pramaanon ko lekar, to unhonne kah diya ki ye to khula jaadoo hai
aur usase adhik atyaachaaree kaun hoga, jo jhooth ghade allaah par, jabaki vah bulaaya ja raha ho islaam kee or aur allaah maargadarshan nahin deta atyaachaaree jaati ko
ve chaahate hain ki bujha den allaah ke prakaash ko apane mukhon se tatha allaah poora karane vaala hai apane prakaash ko, yadyapi bura lage kaafiron ko
vahee hai, jisane bheja hai apane rasool ko sammaarg tatha satdharm ke saath taaki prabhaavit kar de use pratyek dharm par, chaahe bura lage mushrikon ko
he eemaan vaalo! kya main bata doon tumhen aisa vyaapaar, jo bacha le tumhen duhkhadaayee yaatana se
tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool par aur jihaad karo allaah kee raah mein apane dhanon aur praanon se, yahee tumhaare lie uttam hai, yadi tum jaano
vah kshama kar dega tumhaare paap aur pravesh dega tumhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen tatha svachchh gharon mein sthaayee svargon mein. yahee badee saphalata hai
aur ek any (pradaan) jisase tum prem karate ho. vah allaah kee sahaayata tatha sheeghr vijay hai tatha shubh soochana suna do eemaan vaalon ko

he eemaan vaalo! tum ban jao allaah (ke dharm) ke sahaayak, jaise maryam ke putr eesa ne havaariyon se kaha tha ki kaun mera sahaayak hai allaah (ke dharm ke prachaar mein)? to havaariyon ne kahaah ham hain allaah ke (dharm ke) sahaayak. to eemaan laaya israeeliyon ka ek samooh aur kufr kiya doosare samooh ne. to hamane samarthan diya unako, jo eemaan laaye, unake shatru ke virudhd, to vahee vijayee rahe
allaah kee pavitrata ka varnan karatee hain, vah sab cheezen, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hain. jo adhipati, ati pavitr, prabhaavashaalee, gunee (daksh) hai

vahee hai, jisane niraksharon[1] mein ek rasool bheja unheen mein se. jo padhakar sunaate hain unhen allaah kee aayaten aur pavitr karate hain unhen tatha shiksha dete hain unhen pustak (quraan) tatha tatvadarshita (sunnat)[2] kee. yadyapi ve isase poorv khule kupath mein the
tatha doosaron ke lie bhee unamen se, jo unase abhee nahin[1] mile hain. vah allaah prabhutvashaalee, gunee hai
ye[1] allaah ka anugrah hai, jise vah pradaan karata hai use, jise vah chaahata hai aur allaah bade anugrah vaala hai

unakee dasha jinapar tauraat ka bhaar rakha gaya, phir tadaanusaar karm nahin kiya, us gadhe ke samaan hai, jisake oopar pustaken[1] ladee huee hon. bura hai us jaati ka udaaharan, jinhonne jhuthala diya allaah kee aayaton ko aur allaah maargadarshan nahin deta atyaachaariyon ko
aap kah den ki he yahoodiyo! yadi tum samajhate ho ki tum hee allaah ke mitr ho any logon ke atirikt, to kaamana karo maran kee yadi tun sachche[1] ho
tatha ve apane kiye hue karatooton ke kaaran, kadaapi usakee kaamana nahin karenge aur allaah bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai atyaachaariyon se

aap kah den ki jis maut se tum bhaag rahe ho, vah avashy tumase milakar rahegee. phir tum avashy pher diye jaoge paroksh (chhupe) tatha pratyaksh (khule) ke gyaanee kee or. phir vah tumhen soochit kar dega usase, jo tum karate ho
he eemaan vaalo! jab azaan dee jaaye namaaz ke lie jumua ke din, to daud[1] jao allaah kee yaad kee or tatha tyaag do kray-vikray.[2] ye uttam hai tumhaare lie, yadi tum jaano
phir jab namaaz ho jaaye, to phail jao dharatee mein tatha khoj karo allaah ke anugrah kee tatha varnan karate raho allaah ka atyadhik, taaki tum saphal ho jao

aur jab ve dekh lete hain koee vyaapaar athava khel, to usakee or daud padate hain.[1] tatha aapako chhod dete hain khade. aap kah den ki jo kuchh allaah ke paas hai, vah uttam hai khel tatha vyaapaar se aur allaah sarvottam jeevika pradaan karane vaala hai

jab aate hain aapake paas munaafiq, to kahate hain ki ham saakshy (gavaahee) dete hain ki vaastav mein aap allaah ke rasool hain tatha allaah jaanata hai ki vaastav mein aap allaah ke rasool hain aur allaah gavaahee deta hai ki munaafiq nishchay jhoothe[1] hain
unhonne bana rakha hai apanee shapathon ko ek dhaal aur ruk gaye allaah kee raah se. vaastav mein, ve bada dushkarm kar rahe hain
ye sab kuchh is kaaran hai ki ve eemaan laaye, phir kufr kar gaye, to muhar laga dee allaah ne unake dilon par, atah, ve samajhate nahin

aur yadi aap unhen dekhen, to aapako bha jaayen unake shareer aur yadi ve baat karen, to aap sunane lagen unakee baat, jaise ki ve lakadiyaan hon deevaar ke sahaare lagaayee[1] hueen. ve pratyek kadee dhvani ko apane virudhd[2] samajhate hain. vahee shatru hain, aap unase saavadhaan rahen. allaah unhen naash kare, ve kidhar phire ja rahe hain

jab unase kaha jaata hai ki aao, taaki kshama kee praarthana karen tumhaare lie allaah ke rasool, to mod lete hain apane sir tatha aap unhen dekhate hain ki ve ruk jaate hain abhimaan (ghamand) karate hue

he nabee! unake sameep samaan hai ki aap kshama kee praarthana karen unake lie athava kshama kee praarthana na karen unake lie. kadaapi nahin kshama karega allaah unhen. vaastav mein allaah supath nahin dikhaata hai avagyaakaariyon ko

yahee vo log hain, jo kahate hain ki mat kharch karo unapar, jo allaah ke rasool ke paas rahate hain, taaki ve bikhar jaayen. jabaki allaah hee ke adhikaar mein hain aakaashon tatha dharatee ke sabhee kosh (khazaane). parantu munaafiq samajhate nahin hain

ve kahate hain ki yadi ham vaapas pahunch gaye madeena tak, to nikaal[1] dega sammaanit usase apamaanit ko. jabaki allaah hee ke lie sammaan hain evan usake rasool tatha eemaan vaalon ke lie. parantu munaafiq jaanate nahin
he eemaan vaalo! tumhen achet na karen tumhaare dhan tatha tumhaaree santaan allaah ke smarn (yaad) se aur jo aisa karenge, vahee kshati grast hain

tatha daan karo usamen se, jo pradaan kiya hai hamane tumhen, isase poorv ki aa jaaye tumamen se kisee ke maran ka[1] samay, to kahe ki mere paalanahaar! kyon nahin avasar de diya mujhe kuchh samay ka. taaki main daan karata tatha sadaachaariyon mein ho jaata
aur kadaapi allaah avasar nahin deta kisee praanee ko, jab aa jaaye usaka nirdhaarit samay aur allaah bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai usase, jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho
allaah kee pavitrata varnan karatee hai pratyek cheez, jo aakaashon mein hai tatha jo dharatee mein hai. usee ka raajy hai aur usee ke lie prashansa hai tatha vah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
vahee hai, jisane utpann kiya hai tumhen, to tumamen se kuchh kaafir hain aur tumamen se koee eemaan vaala hai tatha allaah jo kuchh tum karate ho, use dekh raha hai
usane utpann kiya aakaashon tatha dharatee ko saty ke saath tatha roop banaaya tumhaara to sundar banaaya tumhaara roop aur usee kee or phirakar jaana hai
vah jaanata hai, jo kuchh aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur jaanata hai, jo tum man mein rakhate ho aur jo bolate ho tatha allaah bhalee-bhaanti avagat hai dilon ke bhedon se
kya nahin aaee tumhaare paas unakee soochana, jinhonne kufr kiya isase poorv? to unhonne chakh liya apane karm ka dushparinaam aur unheen ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai

ye isalie ki aate rahe unake paas unake rasool khulee nishaaniyaan lekar. to unhonne kahaah kya koee manushy hamen maargadarshan[1] dega? atah unhonne kufr kiya tatha munh pher liya aur allaah (bhee unase) nishchint ho gaya tatha allaah nisprh, prashansit hai

samajh rakha hai kaafiron ne ki ve kadaapi phir jeevit nahin kiye jaayenge. aap kah den ki kyon nahin? mere paalanahaar kee shapath! tum avashy jeevit kiye jaoge. phir tumhen bataaya jaayega ki tumane (sansaar mein) kya kiya hai tatha ye allaah par ati saral hai
atah tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool[1] par tatha us noor (jyoti)[2] par, jise hamane utaara hai tatha allaah usase, jo tum karate ho bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai

jis din vah tumhen ekatr karega, ekatr kiye jaane vaale din. to vah kshati (haani) ke khul jaane[1] ka din hoga aur jo eemaan laaya allaah par tatha sadaachaar karata hai, to vah kshama kar dega usake doshon ko aur pravesh dega use aise svargon mein, bahatee hongee jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge unamen. yahee badee saphalata hai
aur jin logon ne kufr kiya aur jhuthalaaya hamaaree aayaton (nishaaniyon) ko, to vahee naarakee hain, jo sadaavaasee honge us (narak) mein tatha vah bura thikaana hai
jo aapada aatee hai, vah allaah hee kee anumati se aatee hai tatha jo allaah par eemaan[1] laaye, to vah maargadarshan deta[2] hai usake dil ko tatha allaah pratyek cheez ko jaanata hai
tatha aagya ka paalan karo allaah kee tatha aagya ka paalan karo usake rasool kee. phir yadi tum vimukh hue, to hamaare rasool ka daayitv keval khule roop se (upadesh) pahuncha dena hai
allaah vah hai, jisake siva koee vandaneey ( sachcha poojy) nahin hai. atah, allaah hee par bharosa karana chaahiye eemaan vaalon ko

he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! vaastav mein, tumhaaree kuchh patniyaan tatha santaan tumhaaree shatru[1] hain. atah, unase saavadhaan raho aur yadi tum kshama se kaam lo tatha sudhaar karo aur kshama kar do, to vaastav mein allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
tumhaare dhan tatha tumhaaree santaan to tumhaare lie ek pareeksha hain tatha allaah ke paas bada pratiphal[1] (badala) hai

to allaah se darate raho, jitana tumase ho sake tatha suno, aagya paalan karo aur daan karo. ye uttam hai tumhaare lie aur jo bacha liya gaya apane man kee kanjoosee se, to vahee saphal hone vaale hain
yadi tum allaah ko uttam rn[1] dogo, to vah tumhen kaee guna badhaakar dega aur kshama kar dega tumhen aur allaah bada gunagraahee, sahanasheel hai
vah paroksh aur haaazir ka gyaan rakhane vaala hai. vah ati prabhaavee tatha gunee hai

he nabee! jab tum log talaaq do apanee patniyon ko, to unhen talaaq do unakee iddat ke lie, aur ganana karo iddat kee tatha daro apane paalanahaar allaah se aur na nikaalo unhen unake gharon se aur na vah svayan nikalen, parantu ye ki ve koee khulee buraee kar jaayen tatha ye allaah kee seemaayen hain aur jo ullanghan karega allaah kee seemaon ka, to usane atyaachaar kar laya apane oopar. tum nahin jaanate sambhavatah allaah koee naee baat utpann kar de isake pashchaat

phir jab pahuchane lagen apane nirdhaarit avadhi ko, to unhen rok lo niyamaanusaar athava alag kar do niyamaanusaar[1] aur gavaah (saakshee) bana lo[2] apane mein se do nyaayakaariyon ko tatha seedhee gavaahee do allaah ke[3] lie. isakee shiksha dee ja rahee hai use, jo eemaan rakhata ho allaah tatha ant-divas (pralay) par aur jo koee darata ho allaah se, to vah bana dega usake lie koee nikalane ka upaay

aur use jeevika pradaan karega, us sthaan se, jisaka use anumaan (bhee) na ho tatha jo allaah par nirbhar rahega, to vahee use paryaapt hai. nishchay allaah apana kaary poora karake rahega.[1] allaah ne pratyek vastu ke lie ek anumaan (samay) niyat kar rakha hai

tatha jo niraash[1] ho jaatee hain maasik dharm se tumhaaree striyon mein se, yadi tumhen sandeh ho to unakee nirdhaarit avadhi teen maas hai tatha unakee, jinhen maasik dharm na aata ho aur garbhavatee striyon kee nirdhaarit avadhi ye hai ki prasav ho jaaye tatha jo allaah se darega, vah usake lie usaka kaary saral kar dega
ye allaah ka aadesh hai, jise utaara hai tumhaaree or, atah, jo allaah se darega[1] vah kshama kar dega usase usake doshon ko tatha pradaan karega use bada pratiphal

aur unhen (nirdhaarit avadhi mein) rakho, jahaan tum rahate ho, apanee shakti anusaar aur unhen haani na pahunchao, unhen tang karane ke lie aur yadi ve garbhavatee hon, to unapar kharch karo, yahaan tak ki prasav ho jaaye. phir yadi doodh pilaayen tumhaare (shishu) ke lie, to unhen unaka paarishramik do aur vichaar-vimarsh kar lo, aapas mein uchit roop[1] se aur yadi tum donon mein tanaav ho jaaye, to doodh pilaayegee use koee doosaree stree

chaahiye ki sampann, kharch de apanee kamaee ke anusaar aur tang ho jisapar usakee jeevika, use chaahiye ki kharch de usamen se, jo diya hai use allaah ne. allaah bhaar nahin rakhata kisee praanee par, parantu utana hee, jo use diya hai. sheeghr hee kar dega allaah tangee ke pashchaat suvidha
kitanee bastiyaan[1] theen jinake vaasiyon ne avagya kee apane paalanahaar aur usake rasoolon ke aadesh kee, to hamane haisaab le liya unaka kada haisaab aur unhen yaatana dee buree yaatana
to usane chakh liya apane karm ka dushparinaam aur unaka kaary-parinaam vinaash hee raha
taiyaar kar rakhee hai allaah ne unake lie bheeshan yaatana. atah, allaah se daro, he samajh vaalo, jo eemaan laaye ho! nihsandeh, allaah ne utaar dee hai tumhaaree or ek shiksha

(arthaat) ek rasool[1] jo padhakar sunaate hain tumhen allaah kee khulee aayaten taaki vah nikaale unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, andhakaaron se prakaash kee or aur jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar karega, vah use pravesh dega aise svargon mein, pravaahit hain jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge unamen. allaah ne usake lie uttam jeevika taiyaar kar rakhee hai

allaah vah hai, jisane utpann kiye saat aakaash tatha dharatee mein se unheen ke samaan. vah utaarata hai aadesh unake beech, taaki tum vishvaas karo ki allaah jo kuchh chaahe, kar sakata hai aur ye ki allaah ne gher rakha hai pratyek vastu ko apane gyaan kee paridhi mein
he nabee! kyon haraam (avaidh) karate hain aap use, jise halaal (vaidh) kiya hai allaah ne aapake lie? aap apanee patniyon kee prasannata[1] chaahate hain? tatha allaah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai
niyam bana diya hai allaah ne tumhaare lie tumhaaree shapathon se nikalane[1] ka tatha allaah sanrakshak hai tumhaara aur vahee sarvagyaanee gunee hai

aur jab nabee ne apanee kuchh patniyon se ek[1] baat kahee, to usane use bata diya aur allaah ne use khol diya nabee par, to nabee ne kuchh se soochit kiya aur kuchh ko chhod diya. phir jab soochit kiya aapane patni ko usase, to usane kahaah kisane soochit kiya aapako is baat se? aapane kahaah moojhe soochit kiya hai sab jaanane aur sabase soochit rahane vaale ne

yadi tum[1] donon (he nabee kee patniyo!) kshama maang lo allaah se (to tumhaare lie uttam hai), kyonki tum donon ke dil kuchh jhuk gaye hain aur yadi tum donon ek-doosare kee sahaayata karogee aapake viroodhd, to nihsandeh allaah aapaka sahaayak hai tatha jibreel aur sadaachaaree eemaan vaale aur farishte (bhee) inake atirikt sahaayak hain

kuchh door nahin ki aapaka paalanahaar, yadi aap talaaq de den tum sabhee ko, to badale mein de aapako patniyaan tumase uttam, islaam vaaliyaan, ibaadat karane vaaliyaan, aagya paalan karane vaaliyaan, kshama maangane vaaliyaan, vrat rakhane vaaliyaan, vidhavaayen tatha kumaariyaan

he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! bachao[1] apane aapako tatha apane parijanon ko us agni se, jisaka eendhan manushy tatha patthar honge. jisapar farishte niyukt hain kade dil, kade svabhaav vaale. ve avagya nahin karate allaah ke aadesh kee tatha vahee karate hain, jisaka aadesh unhen diya jaaye
he kaafiro! bahaana na banao aaj, tumhen usee ka badala diya ja raha hai, jo tum karate rahe

he eemaan vaalo! allaah ke aage sachchee[1] tauba karo. sambhav hai ki tumhaara paalanahaar door kar de tumhaaree buraeeyaan tumase tatha pravesh kara de tumhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen. jis din vah apamaanit nahin karega nabee ko aur na unhen, jo eemaan laaye hain unake saath. unaka prakaash[2] daud raha hoga, unake aage tatha unake daayen, ve praarthana kar rahe hongeh he hamaare paalanahaar! poorn kar de hamaare lie hamaara prakaash tatha kshama kar de hamen. vaastav mein, too jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
he nabee! aap jihaad karen kaafiron aur munaafiqon se aur unapar kadaee karen.[1] unaka sthaan narak hai aur vah bura sthaan hai

allaah ne udaaharan diya hai unake lie, jo kaafir ho gaye nooh kee patnee tatha loot kee patnee ka. jo donon vivaah mein theen do bhakton ke, hamaare sadaachaaree bhakton mein se. phir donon ne vishvaasaghaat[1] kiya unase. to donon unake, allaah ke yahaan kuchh kaam nahin aaye tatha (donon striyon se) kaha gaya ki pravesh kar jao narak mein pravesh karane vaalon ke saath

tatha udaaharan[1] diya hai allaah ne unake lie, jo eemaan laaye, firaun kee patnee ka. jab usane praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! bana de mere lie apane paas ek ghar svarg mein tatha mujhe mukt kar de firaun tatha usake karm se aur mujhe mukt kar de atyaachaaree jaati se

tatha maryam, imaraan kee putree ka, jisane raksha kee apane sateetv kee, to phoonk dee hamane usamen apanee or se rooh (aatma) tatha us (maryam) ne sach maana apane paalanahaar kee baaton aur usakee pustakon ko aur vah ibaadat karane vaalon mein se thee
shubh hai vah allaah, jisake haath mein raajy hai tatha jo kuchh vah chaahe, kar sakata hai
jisane utpann kiya hai mrtyu tatha jeevan ko, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha le ki tumamen kisaka karm adhik achchha hai? tatha vah prabhutvashaalee, ati kshamaavaan hai
jisane utpann kiye saat aakaash, oopar tale. to kya tum dekhate ho atyant krpaasheel kee utpatti mein koee asangati? phir punah dekho, kya tum dekhate ho koee daraad
phir baar-baar dekho, vaapas aayegee tumhaaree or nigaah thak-haar kar

aur hamane sajaaya hai sansaar ke aakaash ko pradeepon (grahon) se tatha banaaya hai unhen (taaron ko) maar bhagaane ka saadhan shaitaanon[1] ko, aur taiyaar kee hai hamane unake lie dahakatee agni kee yaatana
aur jinhonne kufr kiya apane paalanahaar ke saath to unake lie narak kee yaatana hai. aur vah bura sthaan hai
jab vah phenke jaayenge usamen to sunenge usakee dahaad aur vah khaul rahee hogee
prateet hoga ki phat padegee rosh (krodh) ser, jab-jab phenka jaayega usamen koee samooh to prashn karenge unase usake prahareeh kya nahin aaya tumhaare paas koee saavadhaan karane vaala (rasool)
vah kahengeh haan hamaare paas aaya saavadhaan karane vaala. par hamane jhuthala diya aur kaha ki nahin utaara hai allaah ne kuchh. tum hee bade kupath mein ho
tatha vah kahengeh yadi hamane suna aur samajha hota to narak ke vaasiyon mein na hote
aise vah sveekaar kar lenge apane paapon ko. to dooree[1] hai narak vaasiyon ke lie
nihsandeh jo darate hon apane paalanahaar se bin dekhe unheen ke lie kshama hai tatha bada pratiphal hai
tum chupake bolo apanee baat athava oonche svar mein. vaastav mein vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai seenon ke bhedon ko
kya vah nahin jaanega jis ne utnn kiya? aur vah sookshmadarshak[1] sarv soochit hai
vahee hai jis ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko vashvartee, to chalo-phiro usake kshetron mein tatha khao usakee pradaan kee huee jeevika. aur usee kee or tumhen phir jeevit ho kar jaana hai
kya tum nirbhay ho gaye ho usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah dhansa de dharatee mein phir vah achaanak kaanpane lage
athava nirbhay ho gaye usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah bhej de tum par pathareelee vaayu to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaisa raha mera saavadhaan karana
jhuthala chuke hain in[1] se poorv ke log to kaisee rahee meree pakad
kya unhonne nahin dekha pakshiyon kee or apane oopar pankh phailaate tatha sikodate. un ko atyant krpaasheel hee thaamata hai. nisandeh vah pratyek vastu ko dekh raha hai
kaun hai vah tumhaaree sena jo tumhaaree sahaayata kar sakegee allaah ke muqaabale mein? balki vah ghus gaye hain avaigya tatha ghrna mein।
ya kaun hai jo tumhen jeevika pradaan kar sake, yadi rok le vah apanee jeevika? balki ve ghus gaye hain avaigya tatha ghrna mein
to kya jo chal raha ho aundha ho kar apane munh ke bal vah adhik maargadarshan par hai ye jo seedha ho kar chal raha ho seedhee raah par
he nabee! aap kah den ki vahee hai jis ne paida kiya hai tumhen aur banaaye hain tumhaare kaan tatha aankh aur dil. bahut hee kam aabhaaree (krtagy) hote ho
aap kah deh useene phailaaya hai tumhen dharatee mein aur usee kee or ekatrit[1] kiye jaoge
tatha vah kahate hain ki ye vachan kab poora hoga yadi tum sachche ho
aap kah deh us ka gyaan bas allaah hee ko hai. aur main keval khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon
phir jab vah dekhenge use sameep, to bigad jaayenge unake chehare jo kaafir ho gaye. tatha kaha jaayegaah ye vahee hai jisakee tum maang kar rahe the
aap kah deh dekho yadi allaah naash kar de mujh ko tatha mere saathiyon ko athava daya kare ham par, to (batao ki) kaun hai jo sharan dega kaafiron ko duhkhadaayee[1] yaatana se
aap kah deh vah atyant krpaasheel hai. ham usapar eemaan laaye tatha useepar bharosa kiya, to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaun khule kupath mein hai
aap kah deh bhala dekho yadi tumhaara paanee gaharaee mein chala jaaye, to kaun hai jo tumhen la kar dega bahata hua jal
noon aur shapath hai lekhanee (qalam) kee tatha usakee[1] jise vo likhate hain
nahin hai aap, apane paalanahaar ke anugrah se paagal
tatha nishchay pratiphal (badala) hai aapake lie anant
tatha nishchay hee aap bade susheel hain
to sheeghr aap dekh lenge tatha ve (kaafir bhee) dekh lenge
ki paagal kaun hai
vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee adhik jaanata hai use, jo kupath ho gaya usakee raah se aur vahee adhik jaanata hai unhen, jo seedhee raah par hain
to aap baat na maanen jhuthalaane vaalon kee
ve chaahate hain ki aap dheele ho jaayen, to ve bhee dheele ho[1] jaayen
aur baat na maanen[1] aap kisee adhik shapath lene vaale, heen vyakti kee
jo vyang karane vaala, chugaliyaan khaata phirata hai
bhalaee se rokane vaala, atyaachaaree, bada paapee hai
ghamandee hai aur isake pashchaat kuvansh (varn sankar) hai
isalie ki vah dhan tatha putron vaala hai
jab padhee jaatee hai usapar hamaaree aayaten, to kahata haih ye poorvajon kee kalpit kathaayen hain
sheeghr hee ham daag laga denge usake soond[1] par
nihsandeh, hamane unhen pareeksha mein daala[1] hai, jis prakaar baag vaalon ko pareeksha mein daala tha. jab unhonne shapath lee ki avashy tod lenge usake phal bhor hote hee
aur in sha allaah (yadi allaah ne chaaha) nahin kaha
to phir gaya us baag par ek kuchakr, aapake paalanahaar kee or se aur ve soye hue the
to vah ho gaya jaise ujaad khetee ho
ab ve ek-doosare ko pukaarane lage bhor hote heeh
ki tadake chalo apanee khetee par, yadi phal todane hain
phir ve chal diye aapas mein chupake-chupake baaten karate hue
ki kadaapi na aane paaye us (baag) ke bheetar aaj tumhaare paas koee nirdhan
aur praatah hee pahunch gaye ki ve phal tod sakenge
phir jab use dekha to kahaah nishchay ham raah bhool gaye
balki ham vanchit ho[1] gaye
to unamen se bichale bhaee ne kahaah kya mainne tumase nahin kaha tha ki tum (allaah kee) pavitrata ka varnan kyon nahin karate
ve kahane lageh pavitr hai hamaara paalanahaar! vaastav mein, ham hee atyaachaaree the
phir sammukh ho gaye, ek-doosare kee ninda karate hue
kahane lageh haay afsos! ham hee vidrohee the
sambhav hai hamaara paalanahaar hamen badale mein pradaan kare isase uttam (baag). ham apane paalanahaar hee kee or roochi rakhate hain
aise hee yaatana hotee hai aur aakhirat (paralok) kee yaatana isase bhee badee hai. kaash ve jaanate
nihsandeh, sadaachaariyon ke lie unake paalanahaar ke paas sukhon vaale svarg hain
kya ham aagyaakaariyon[1] ko paapiyon ke samaan kar denge
tumhen kya ho gaya hai? tum kaisa nirnay kar rahe ho
kya tumhaare paas koee pustak hai, jisamen tum padhate ho
ki tumhen vahee milega, jo tum chaahoge
ya tumane hamase shapathen le rakhee hain, jo pralay tak chalee jaayengee ki tumhen vahee milega jisaka tum nirnay karoge
aap unase poochhiye ki unamen kaun isakee zamaanat leta hai

vah kshama kar dega tumahaare lie tumhaare paapon ko tatha avasar dega tumhen nirdhaarit samay[1] tak. vaastav mein, jab allaah ka nirdhaarit samay aa jaayega, to usamen der na hogee. kaash tum jaanate
nooh ne kahaah mere paalanahaar! mainne bulaaya apanee jaati ko (teree or) raat aur din
to mere bulaave ne unake bhaagane hee ko adhik kiya
aur mainne jab-jab unhen bulaaya, to unhonne de leen apanee ungaliyaan apane kaanon mein tatha odh lie apane kapade[1] tatha ade rah gaye aur bada ghamand kiya
phir mainne unhen uchch svar mein bulaaya
phir mainne unase khulakar kaha aur unase dheere-dheere (bhee) kaha
mainne kahaah kshama maango apane paalanahaar se, vaastav mein vah bada kshamaasheel hai
vah varsha karega aakaash se tumapar dhaaraapravaah varsha
tatha adhik dega tumhen putr tatha dhan aur bana dega tumhaare lie baag tatha naharen
kya ho gaya hai tumhen ki nahin darate ho allaah kee mahima se
jabaki usane paida kiya hai tumhen vibhinn prakaar[1] se
kya tumane nahin dekha ki kaise paida kiye hain allaah ne saat aakaash, oopar-tale
aur banaaya hai chandrama ko unamen prakaash aur banaaya hai soory ko pradeep
aur allaah hee ne ugaaya hai tumhen dharatee[1] se adbhut roop se
phir vah vaapas le jaayega tumhen usamen aur nikaalega tumhen usase
aur allaah ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko bistar
taaki tum chalo usakee khulee raahon mein
nooh ne nivedan kiyaah mere paalanahaar! unhonne meree avagya kee aur anusaran kiya usaka[1] jisake dhan aur santaan ne usakee kshati hee ko badhaaya
aur unhonne badee chaal chalee
aur unhonne kahaah tum kadaapi na chhodana apane poojyon ko aur kadaapi na chhodana vadd ko, na suva ko aur na yagoos ko aur na yaooq ko tatha na nasr[1] ko
aur kupath (gumaraah) kar diya hai unhonne bahuton ko aur adhik kar de too bhee atyaachaariyon ke kupath[1] (kumaarg) ko
ve apane paapon ke kaaran dubo diye gaye, phir pahuncha diye gaye narak mein aur nahin paaya unhonne apane lie allaah ke muqaabale mein koee sahaayak
tatha kaha nooh neh mere paalanahaar! na chhod dharatee par kaafiron ka koee gharaana
kyonki yadi too unhen chhodega, to ve kupath karenge tere bhakton ko aur nahin janm denge, parantu dushkarmee, bade kaafir ko

mer paalanahaar! kshama kar de mujhe tatha mere maata-pita ko aur use, jo pravesh kare mere ghar mein eemaan laakar tatha eemaan vaalon aur eemaan vaaliyon ko tatha kaafiron ke vinaash hee ko adhik kar
(he nabee!) kahoh meree or vahyee (prakaashna[1]) kee gayee hai ki dhyaan se suna jinnon ke ek samooh ne. phir kaha ki hamane suna hai ek vichitr quraan
jo dikhaata hai seedhee raah, to ham eemaan laaye usapar aur ham kadaapi saajhee nahin banaayenge apane paalanahaar ke saath kisee ko
tatha nihsandeh mahaan hai hamaare paalanahaar kee mahima, nahin banaee hai usane koee sanginee (patnee) aur na koee santaan
tatha nishchay ham agyaan mein kah rahe the allaah ke sambandh mein jhoothee baaten
aur ye ki hamane samajha ki manushy tatha jinn nahin bol sakate allaah par koee jhooth baat
aur vaastavikta ye hai ki manushy mein se kuchh log, sharan maangate the jinnon mein se kuchh logon kee, to unhonne adhik kar diya unake garv ko
aur ye ki manushyon ne bhee vahee samajha, jo tumane anumaan lagaaya ki kabhee allaah phir jeevit nahin karega, kisee ko
tatha hamane sparsh kiya aakaash ko, to paaya ki bhar diya gaya hai prahariyon tatha ulkaon se
aur ye ki ham baithate the us (aakaash) mein sun-gun lene ke sthaanon mein aur jo ab sunane ka prayaas karega, vah paayega apane lie ek ulka ghaat mein laga hua
aur ye ki ham nahin samajh paate ki kya kisee buraee ka iraada kiya gaya dharatee vaalon ke saath ya iraada kiya hai, unake saath unake paalanahaar ne seedhee raah par laane ka
aur hamamen se kuchh sadaachaaree hain aur hamamen se kuchh isake vipareet hain. ham vibhinn prakaaron mein vibhaajit hain
tatha hamen vishvaas ho gaya hai ki ham kadaapi vivash nahin kar sakate allaah ko dharatee mein aur na vivash kar sakate hain use bhaagakar
tatha jab hamane sunee maargadarshan kee baat, to usapar eemaan le aaye, ab jo bhee eemaan laayega apane paalanahaar par, to nahin bhay hoga use adhikaar hanan ka aur na kisee atyaachaar ka
aur ye ki hamamen se kuchh muslim (aagyaakaaree) hain aur kuchh atyaachaaree hain. to jo aagyaakaaree ho gaye, to unhonne khoj lee seedhee raah
tatha jo atyaachaaree hain, to ve narak ke eendhan ho gaye
aur ye ki yadi ve sthit rahate seedhee raah ( arthaat islaam) par, to ham seenchate unhen bharapoor jal se
taaki unakee pareeksha len isamen, aur jo vimukh hoga apane paalanahaar ke smaran (yaad) se, to use usaka paalanahaar grast karega kadee yaatana mein
aur ye ki masjiden[1] allaah ke lie hain. atah, mat pukaaro allaah ke saath kisee ko
aur ye ki jab khada hua allaah ka bhakt[1] use pukaarata hua, to sameep tha ki ve log usapar pil padate
aap kah den ki main to keval apane paalanahaar ko pukaarata hoon aur saajhee nahin banaata usaka kisee any ko
aap kah den ki main adhikaar nahin rakhata tumhaare lie kisee haani ka, na seedhee raah par laga dene ka
aap kah den ki mujhe kadaapi nahin bacha sakega allaah se koee[1] aur na main pa sakoonga usake siva koee sharanagaar (bachane ka sthaan)
